block.p: COULOUCOUNDIS-Anthony G. On June 8, 2000. Beloved husband of Marina and the late Marion. Cherished father of Roxann Couloucoundis Goldberg, Georgette Parry and the late Anthony Coucloucoundis, II. Father-in-law of Craig and Jeff. Devoted grandfather of Kaitlin, Anthony, William and Nicholas Parry and Marion Goldberg. Dearest brother of Martis and Effie Culucundis and Nina Culucundis. Beloved uncle and cousin of many. Friends may call at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave at 81 St, Monday, 6-8PM. Funeral service Holy Trinity Greek Orthodox Cathedral, 343 E. 74 St, Tuesday, 11AM. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to the Anthony G. Couloucoundis, II Memorial Fund, c/o Allen Stevenson School, 132 E. 78 St, NY NY 10021 attn Ms. Linda Ellenberg.
